mapper.select: SELECT * FROM APPL_INFO WHERE PASS_INFO < 3 AND CRCLM_CD = #{CRCLM_CD} AND RECRT_SCHDL_CD = #{RECRT_SCHDL_CD} AND (RECRT_SCHDL_CD <> 2 OR interview IS NOT NULL) AND passed = "합격" AND RECRT_YEAR = #{RECRT_YEAR} AND payment = "1" AND KORN_FLNM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{KORN_FLNM}, '%') ORDER BY CASE WHEN RECRT_SCHDL_CD = 2 THEN total ELSE avg END DESC
SELECT PASS_INFO FROM APPL_INFO WHERE appl_NO=#{appl_NO};
SELECT RECRT_YEAR FROM RECRT_SCHDL GROUP BY RECRT_YEAR ORDER BY RECRT_YEAR DESC
